summary: This document is a statement in support of the registration of JEGE LLC, a limited liability company associated with Jeffrey Epstein. It outlines the citizenship status of the members and managers of the LLC, confirming that they are U.S. citizens, which is a requirement for registering aircraft under U.S. law.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as a member of JEGE LLC and is confirmed to be a U.S. citizen, which is necessary for the LLC to register aircraft.

persons.name: Lawrence Visoski
persons.context: Lawrence Visoski is mentioned as a manager of JEGE LLC and is also confirmed to be a U.S. citizen.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein and Lawrence Visoski are connected through their roles in JEGE LLC, with Epstein being a member and Visoski serving as a manager.

keyFacts: JEGE LLC is a limited liability company eligible to register aircraft in its name.
The effective date of JEGE LLC is October 19, 2012.
Jeffrey Epstein is confirmed as a U.S. citizen and a member of JEGE LLC.
Lawrence Visoski is also confirmed as a U.S. citizen and a manager of JEGE LLC.
The document emphasizes that the LLC cannot register as a non-citizen corporation.
